title: PowerToys 0.58 update prepares native ARM64 version and brings more improvements
content:
Microsoft has once again updated the PowerToys suite of tools for Windows, bringing it to version 0.58. This new update doesn’t add any new user-facing features per se, but it does make some important under-the-hood changes, including preparing for an upcoming ARM64 version of the app. Currently, PowerToys is only designed for x64 processors, meaning

The post PowerToys 0.58 update prepares native ARM64 version and brings more improvements appeared first on XDA.
description: Microsoft has released PowerToys 0.58, bringing many under-the-hood improvements to the suite of tools, including work on an ARM64 version.
